items.title: Stalled Sister City Plan Reveals New German Wariness of China
items.abstract: The German port of Kiel and the Chinese port of Qingdao have a lot of things in common. Unfortunately, submarines are among them.

items.title: How a Texas Border City Is Shaping the Future of Global Trade
items.abstract: Laredo, across from Mexico on the Rio Grande, is primed to become one of the world’s most important land ports as American companies reduce their reliance on factories in Asia.

items.title: The Sinister Brutality of Shipping Container Architecture
items.abstract: It’s become a mark of hipster modernity everywhere from Amsterdam to Beijing. It’s also utterly ill-suited for human life.

items.title: Hotel Review: The WineBox Valparaíso, Chile
items.abstract: A hotel — and urban winery — created out of shipping containers and wrapped in a blanket of sustainability makes its mark on the undulating hills of “Valpo.”

items.title: Judge Orders UPS to Pay $247 Million for Illegally Shipping Cigarettes
items.abstract: A federal judge in Manhattan said UPS needed to pay a “very significant award” to curb future conduct and to send a message to company executives.
